title: calligraphy-type script on condolences card
content:
Is anyone else having trouble attaching a file? It indicated ’directory failed’ ... I have tried using Internet Explorer and Firefox ... no luck :(

 [‹ "wakes" brush/marker/script](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053716/http:/typophile.com/node/19380 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Simon & Garfunkel "Bookends" album type - Venus {James Eden} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053716/http:/typophile.com/node/19427 "Go to next forum topic")
author: link

comments.content: Well, I did it, in a roundabout way but there you have it :) What is it :))

I am pretty sure this is the work of [Rob Leuschke](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053716/http:/www.typesetit.com/), but I do not think it is one of his available designs. He has done a lot of work for greeting cards that apparently is custom for them.

- Mike Yanega

By the way, how did you post your image? I have had trouble too.

- Mike Yanega
Hi Mike ... Thanks! I posted my image as a ’reply’ (to myself) :)
